SummaryOfDirectChrtblActyGrp.Description1Txt: BIBLES & BIKES IS A CHRISTIAN CHARITABLE EVENT DESIGNED TO PROVIDE FOOD AND GIFTS FOR UNDERPRIVILEDGED CHILDREN DURING THE CHRISTMAS SEASON. THE EVENT SERVES 1,000 CHILDREN IN THE SOUTHEAST TEXAS REGION.

RlnOfActyToAccomOfExmptPrpsGrp.RelationshipStatementTxt: THERE ARE NO ACTIVITIES REPORTED WHICH PRODUCE INCOME EXCEPT MONEY INVESTED AT COMMUNITY BANK AND NORTHERN TRUST
